title: Power BI Overview Course for Complete Beginners

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 1-Getting to Know Power BI)
value.excerpt: If you are looking for a job and need to learn Power BI this is the perfect course for you. In this course you will learn Power BI using Facebook marketing data. You can get the data set for the course here: https://github.com/Gaelim/Power-BI-Courses/blob/master/fb_campaign.csv
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hhsAdo7UUXc" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 2 - Your First Graphs and Homework)
value.excerpt: This is the second part of the Power BI course you will learn more about the interface and create visuals and answer the  homework question with Power BI native visuals.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4SyIB4u8-1o" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 3 Hierarchies and Drilling)
value.excerpt: Learn about data hierarchies and drilling in Power BI. Also answer the 2nd homework question.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Q-H5DT_c6KU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 4 Custom Hierarchies)
value.excerpt: Learn how to make your own hierarchies in Power Bi which allows you to drill and set up your data for drilling. You will get additional homework questions. https://www.absentdata.com/course-material/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jjIro-dV8M0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 5 Slicers and Filters)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use slicers and filters in Power BI to present a different context to your data. Homework question 5.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/f5XFbWnS77Y" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 6 Styling Charts)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Format Pane to sytle your charts with themes, lables, colors and size.  Homework: What the percent of females who converted in Campaign 1?
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6S0bAv_ff_0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners ( Part 7 Calculated Columns)
value.excerpt: Learn the importance of a Calculated Column and how to create them in Power BI. Howework: Which ad managers had the highest total daily sales?
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wk-q-BMKkrQ" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 8 Replacing Values)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the essential Find and Replace feature in Power BI.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P-DEkDANmjs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 9 Calculated Measures and Profit)
value.excerpt: Use calculated measures to determine profit. Use a great visuals to determine where the company is losing money.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YJgLw0LxD6Y" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners ( Part 10 Styling Maps)
value.excerpt: Use your geographic data to quickly produce a map and style it with the many native featuters. Howework: What is the most profitable state?
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3fHOGKMJxNc" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 11 Conditional Formatting )
value.excerpt: Learning how to add conditional formatting to graphs tables. Utilize colors and icons to deliver quick insights
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ci5-CptHC84" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 12 Segments and Filters)
value.excerpt: Learn the difference between segments and filter. Optimize the user experience by learn how to make an interactivity using custom filters.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sQ7tObH5CGY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 15 Drillthrough)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create drillthrough reports with these easy to follow steps.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZPDpIceAi8M" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course For Beginners (Part 16 Updating Data)
value.excerpt: Learn how to append your exisiting data to a new dataset using the Query Editor in Power BI.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FJFlgIm26og" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 13 Customizing Visuals and Dashboard Structure)
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly customize your visuals for maximum impact and use visual philosophy to improve your insights.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/x8e3czhaTU4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners ( Part 14 Backgrounds, Shapes and Wallpaper )
value.excerpt: Learn how to focus the users attention by using shapes, backgrounds and wallpapers. Maxizime your white space and utlilize dashboard design techniques to make a stunning and insightful visual.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XjNF7SMYhYk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
